name: CUSTOM Original Art Replica of your child's drawing on 9x12 canvas panel....ReImaginations
description:
****Photos listed are just examples of past Re-Imaginations. :)

I am now offering a unique custom art experience called Re-Imaginations. Using your child's emailed drawing as my guide, I will recreate an original, fun and unique piece of art on a 9x12 canvas panel! A canvas panel is simply a flat, hard, un-stretched canvas.

What a great way to preserve the original art and have some new wall art for their room all at the same time!

Take a look at my photos, which show the child's picture, followed by my painting. These were done using my own ideas, but if you have a vision of a certain theme, I can do that instead!

I will always maintain the child's art as true to the original as possible. I then "Re-Imagine" it to make it both whimsical and artistic.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

****You can email your child's drawing to me, no need to mail it! :)

***This is custom art and is painted as it is ordered, which means others may be ahead of you. If you need your painting fast, please contact me first to see what the time frame would be.

Your Re-Imagination will be created on a 9x12 canvas panel board. The nice thing about the panels are that there several ways to display them. Here are some of the ways you can hang a flat canvas panel:

1) My favorite way to hang a flat piece of art is to get some nice coordinating ribbon, cut it to the size I want, and then glue both sides of the ribbon to the back corners of the painting. Then, you simply hang it on a nail! You can also tie a bow in the top of the ribbon to make it even more decorative. This makes a nice wall hanging.

2) You can also get a piece of wood that is larger then the painting, drill hole on the back so you can hang it on a nail (kind of like a plaque) paint it and affix the painting on the wood. This method gives the painting a nice border.

3) Buy mirror hangers. They are clear plastic pieces that let you hang a flat mirror.

4) Attach picture hardware to the back with a glue gun.

5) another creative thing to do is get some cute plate stands and place the paintings on them on a mantel or even hang them on the wall that way.

****Hanging hardware NOT included. Thanks!

Shipping to lower 48 states only.

~*~Please visit our Facebook page! https://www.facebook.com/ReImaginations

name: CUSTOM Kid's Drawings into Whimsical 12x16 Canvas Art Painting ReImaginations
description:
****~~****Photos listed are just examples of past Re-Imaginations. I will create your very own, custom Re-Imagination for you. :)

I am now offering a unique custom art experience called Re-Imaginations. Using your child's emailed drawing as my guide, I will recreate an original, fun and unique piece of art on 12x16 un-stretched canvas paper. Just frame in a regular photo frame, right next to their original for instant wall art! :)

What a great way to preserve the original art and have some new wall art for their room all at the same time!

Take a look at my photos, which show the child's picture, followed by my painting. These were done using my own ideas, but if you have a vision of a certain theme, I can do that instead!

I will always maintain the child's art as true to the original as possible. I then "Re-Imagine" it to make it both whimsical and artistic.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

****You can email your child's drawing to me, no need to mail it! :)

***This is custom art and is painted as it is ordered, which means others may be ahead of you. If you need your painting fast, please contact me first to see what the time frame would be.

Your Re-Imagination will be created on a 12x16 canvas sheet (which is just un-stretched canvas), and then will be mailed to you rolled up in a mailing tube or box. It will flatten in a frame.

Shipping to lower 48 states only.

~*~Please visit our Facebook page! https://www.facebook.com/ReImaginations
